review: Which wasn't for very long. I bought this for the special $19.00 price several months ago. Plug and go - watch and loved. Now it won't work at all. It's not the TV either. I'm glad I only paid $20.00 for it as it's not very dependable. Makes me not want to replace it either...I think I'll upgrade to a newer ROKU box first.
